March 19, 2025 - In 2003, American lava lamp maker ... Talon Merchant Capital and its name was changed to Lava Lite LLC. As of 2016, lava lamps were being sold under Lifespan brands in North America. In 2018, the "Lava Lamp" brand was acquired by toy and gift maker Schylling Inc....
